translations.name: NIV Ewe Bible
translations.description: This Biblica translation of the Bible is for the Éwé language, which is primarily used in Ghana. This translation uses an informal language style and applies a meaning-based translation philosophy. It is translated from English NIV and was completed in 2003.

translations.name: Nyanyui la abe ale si mateo ålôe ene
translations.description: This Biblica translation of the Bible is for the Éwé language, which is primarily used in Ghana. This translation uses an informal language style and applies a meaning-based translation philosophy. It is translated from English NIV and was completed in 2003.
